function.name: ParseCoordinate
function.description: Parses a coordinate from a string.

parameter.name: nDefault
parameter.description: Default value to return if pszString is not a valid coordinate value.

return.description: If the coordinate is parsed successfully, the return value is the parsed value. If an error occurs, the return value is the value of the nDefault parameter.

function.remarks: For a discussion of the types of coordinates supported, see GetRCCoordinate.
